jobPostings.title: Junior Software Developer
jobPostings.description: Entry-level software developer position. Responsible for writing clean, maintainable code in a team environment. Familiarity with Java or Python preferred.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, or equivalent experience

jobPostings.title: Marketing Assistant
jobPostings.description: Assist in developing and executing marketing campaigns. Analyze consumer trends and suggest creative strategies. No prior experience needed.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Marketing or related field
Basic understanding of social media platforms

jobPostings.title: Financial Analyst Trainee
jobPostings.description: Entry-level position in our financial department. Will assist senior analysts in creating financial reports and forecasting trends. Training provided.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Finance, Business, or related field

jobPostings.title: Customer Support Representative
jobPostings.description: Entry-level position in our customer support team. Help resolve customer queries, provide product information, and assist in troubleshooting. Prior customer service experience a plus but not required.

jobPostings.title: Graphic Designer
jobPostings.description: Join our team as an entry-level graphic designer. Create engaging designs for our clients, learn from seasoned professionals, and bring your creative flair to a variety of projects.
requirements: Basic knowledge of Adobe Creative Suite
Portfolio showcasing past work (student projects acceptable)

jobPostings.title: Human Resources Assistant
jobPostings.description: An entry-level position in our HR department. Assist with recruitment processes, manage employee records, and contribute to company-wide HR initiatives. Ideal for those passionate about people and organizational culture.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in HR, Business Administration, or related field

jobPostings.title: Content Writer
jobPostings.description: Join our growing content team as an entry-level writer. Craft compelling blog posts, website content, and social media snippets. Opportunity to grow and specialize in different forms of digital content.
requirements: Ability to research and present complex topics in simple terms
